data.title: rotateImage/2DArray
data.statement:
You are given [[N]] lines of input, each with [[N]] space separated characters.

Output the input grid, rotated 90 degrees clockwise.

testCases.title: 5x5
testCases.testIn:
5
o d - - t
l l n u i
l r a o -
e o c y o
h w - - d
testCases.testOut:
h e l l o
w o r l d
- c a n -
- y o u -
d o - i t

testCases.title: 3x3
testCases.testIn:
3
c a t
f n a
k d r
testCases.testOut:
k f c
d n a
r a t

data.constraints:
0<[[N]]<100

There will never be 2 characters not separated by a space.
data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
loop N read line:string(200)
write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[N]] for the width of the square grid.
<<Next [[N]] lines:>> [[N]] space separated characters.
data.outputDescription: <<[[N]] lines:>> Each containing [[N]] space separated characters, rotated 90 degrees clockwise.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are given N lines of input, each with N space separated characters.

Output the input grid, rotated 90 degrees clockwise.
Input
Line 1: An integer N for the width of the square grid.
Next N lines: N space separated characters.
Output
N lines: Each containing N space separated characters, rotated 90 degrees clockwise.
Constraints
0<N<100

There will never be 2 characters not separated by a space.
Example
Input
2
o e
c d
Output
c o
d e
